name: XCavalypse
description: Months after a zombie apocalypse, a displaced group of survivors have come to the task to take back the city in an unconventional way, not with machetes and shotguns, but with a fleet of excavators!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: 3 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5750 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 3.8 Ghz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidea GTX 980ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
